titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to repeal the 30-percent of gross income limitation applicable to regulated investment companies.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 4/6/1995--Introduced. Amends the Internal Revenue Code to repeal the 30 percent limitation (relating to qualification of regulated investment companies) on gross income derived from the sale or disposition of the following held for less than three months: (1) stock or securities; (2) options, futures, or forward contracts; or (3) foreign currencies.
